com.appglu
Interface UserOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserApi, UserTemplate
public interface UserOperations

UserOperations has methods to login / logout and sign up new mobile app users.
UserOperations depends on a implementation of UserSessionPersistence to keep track of the current logged in User.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AsyncUserOperations

Method Summary
 AuthenticationResult login(String username, String password)
          Logs in a previously signed up User if the credentials are correct.
If the log in succeeds, the User will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 boolean logout()
          Removes the logged in user from the UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 Map<String,Object> readData()
          Returns custom user data previously saved to AppGlu using writeData(Map).
 void refreshUserProfile()
          Calls the REST API to refresh the User object saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 AuthenticationResult signup(User user)
          Signs up a new User for your mobile application.
If the sign up succeeds, the User will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 void writeData(Map<String,Object> data)
          Saves custom user data to AppGlu.
 

Method Detail

signup

AuthenticationResult signup(User user)
                            throws AppGluRestClientException
Signs up a new User for your mobile application.
If the sign up succeeds, the User will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.

Parameters:
user - User contains a username and a password
Returns:
If AuthenticationResult.succeed() is false then AuthenticationResult.getError() will contain an error code and a message
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

login

AuthenticationResult login(String username,
                           String password)
                           throws AppGluRestClientException
Logs in a previously signed up User if the credentials are correct.
If the log in succeeds, the User will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.

Parameters:
username - the username used on sign up
password - the password used on sign up
Returns:
If AuthenticationResult.succeed() is false then AuthenticationResult.getError() will contain an error code and a message
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

refreshUserProfile

void refreshUserProfile()
                        throws AppGluRestClientException
Calls the REST API to refresh the User object saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.

Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

logout

boolean logout()
               throws AppGluRestClientException
Removes the logged in user from the UserSessionPersistence implementation.

Returns:
false if the user was already logged out
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

readData

Map<String,Object> readData()
                            throws AppGluRestClientException
Returns custom user data previously saved to AppGlu using writeData(Map).

Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

writeData

void writeData(Map<String,Object> data)
               throws AppGluRestClientException
Saves custom user data to AppGlu. This data can later be retrieved back using readData().

Throws:
AppGluRestClientException
